channel.title: work on Console Labs
channel.description: Recent content in work on Console Labs

item.title: OG Card
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: OG Card: The Emblem of Originality The OG Card? It’s not just a token—it’s a legacy. Being an OG isn’t about being there first; it’s about being there with heart. And this card ensures you keep reaping the rewards of Pod Town’s evolution. OG Card NFT What’s a Pod Town OG Card Pod Town OG Card is an NFT Card made exclusively for OG Minters - people who have minted directly from pod.

item.title: Paw Fellowship
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Paw Fellowship: The Golden Ticket Possessing the Paw Fellowship Card is akin to holding a master key—a key that unlocks the treasures of Pod Town Land & Tokens. This card, transferable and brimming with benefits, is the dream of every Town Builder and Grim Refugee. Paw Fellowship NFT 1. What is Paw Fellowship Card? It’s the ticket for your future whitelist (for Pod Town Land & Token). Also, it’s transferable. You can sell it on the secondary market and it will transfer the perks as well.

item.title: Index
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Console Labs API-first development Continuous Integration Data layer Emoji Format a Neko profile How to work with emoji on Discord Integrate new chain Kekcoin Leverage Mochi balances Log Meaningful commit message Mochi Neko Butt NFT Neko NFT OG Card Paw Fellowship Pod Town Rabby NFT Shape Up Shared UI library in multiple platforms WAGMI comics

item.title: Shape Up
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Exploring We build up knowledge through collective team learning. This page is where lab members share their explorations of the financial world. Every week, we host a presentation to discuss our findings. This not only aids memory recall but also fosters a lasting learning culture within the team, keeping us updated on market trends. We cover a range of topics, from basics like ‘6 jars budgeting methodology’ to more current subjects like ‘web3 liquidity techniques’.

item.title: WAGMI comics
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: WAGMI is a super fun webcomic all about money stuff. We make cool and funny comics with our friends neko and mochi to help everyone with life’s wild moments. Check the comics: wagmicomics.com Facebook: facebook.com/wagmicomics RSS: wagmicomics.com/rss.xml Why WAGMI? After crafting tons of finance stuff and vibing with peeps from all walks of life, it hit us – it’s not just the young guns, but the adulting crew too, who need to level up their money smarts.

item.title: Log
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: A list of changes and updates to our experiments. RSS feed, regular updates. Newsletter for frens, monthly updates. September 2023 console.so: Droppin’ the deets with about, philosophy, log, and peep the newsletter. headless wallet: We gotchu with support for new chains - L2 Optimism & Arbitrum. emoji: Just slapped on 12 more neko emojis on Discord. mochi.gg: Check out the fresh landing page, all about that p2p tipping. wagmi: New domain alert!
